moduleDesc: A module for the website thefreeonlinenovel.com. It's for reading actual novels.

mainPage.javaScript: function Header(key, value){ this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value){ this.value = value; } function Output(sectionName, mangasArray){ this.sectionName = sectionName; this.mangasArray = mangasArray; } function MangasArray(moduleID, image, link, title){ this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; } function MainPageObject(request, headers, method, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output){ this.request = request; this.headers = headers; this.method = method; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } function shuffle(a) { var j, x, i; for (i = a.length - 1; i > 0; i--){ j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1)); x = a[i]; a[i] = a[j]; a[j] = x; } return a; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113022'; var headers = [new Header('', '')]; var extraInfo = []; var currentPos = parseInt(parsedJson.extraInfo[0].value); var mainPageObject; var output = []; if (document.querySelector('div.col-md-8 > h2') != null) { var sectionName = document.querySelector('div.col-md-8 > h2').innerText;} else {var sectionName = '';} var nextRequest = ''; try { nextRequest = parsedJson.extraInfo[currentPos + 1].value; }catch (e) { console.log(e); } if (currentPos != 0) { output = parsedJson.output; } var mangasArray = []; var data = document.querySelector('nav.homebook').querySelectorAll('li'); for (let i = 0; i<data.length; i++) { let book = data[i]; let link = 'http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+ book.querySelector('center > a').href; let title = book.querySelector('a.page-scroll').innerText; let image = 'http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+ book.querySelector('center > a > img').src; console.log(book, link, title, image); mangasArray.push(new MangasArray(moduleID, image, link, title)); } output.push(new Output(sectionName, mangasArray)); for (var x = 0; x < parsedJson.extraInfo.length; x++) { var object = new ExtraInfo(parsedJson.extraInfo[x].value); extraInfo.push(object); } extraInfo[0].value = '' + (currentPos + 1); mainPageObject = new MainPageObject(nextRequest, headers, '', extraInfo, '', '', output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(mainPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

search.javaScript: function Header(key,value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID,image,link,title,type,voice,stars) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.type = type; this.voice = voice; this.stars = stars; } function SearchObject(request,method,headers,separator,extraInfo,loadJavascript,javaScript,output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.separator = separator; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113022'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var searchPageObject; var output = []; var data = document.querySelector('div.col-md-8 > nav.homebook > ul').querySelectorAll('li > center > a'); for(var x = 0; x <data.length; x++){ let image = 'http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+data[x].querySelector('img').src; let link = 'http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+data[x].href; let title = data[x].querySelector('img').alt; let type = 'Book'; let stars = ''; let voice = ''; output.push(new Output(moduleID, image, link, title, type, voice, stars)); } searchPageObject = new SearchObject('','',headers,'+',extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(searchPageObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

info.javaScript: function Header(key, value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(moduleID, image, link, title, description, genres, type, status, chapters) { this.moduleID = moduleID; this.image = image; this.link = link; this.title = title; this.description = description; this.genres = genres; this.type = type; this.status = status; this.chapters = chapters; } function Chapters(link, moduleID) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; } function InfoObject(request, method, headers, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.getElementById('katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113022'; var headers = [new Header('','')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var infoObject; var output; var linkData = parsedJson.request; var basicInfo = document.querySelectorAll('div.col-md-5'); var chapters = []; var type = 'Book'; var status = 'N/A'; var genres = ['Author:', basicInfo[1].querySelector('a').innerText, 'Genres:',]; var desc = document.querySelector('div.col-md-8 > div > p').innerText; var image = 'http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+basicInfo[0].querySelector('img').src; var title = basicInfo[1].querySelector('h3').innerText; var genreTags = basicInfo[1].querySelectorAll('li'); for (let i = 0; i < genreTags.length;i++) { genres.push(genreTags[i].innerText); } var chapterData = document.querySelector('div.main > div.row.bgStyle4 > div.col-md-8 > div').querySelectorAll('div.row')[1].querySelectorAll('div'); for (let i = 0; i < chapterData.length; i++) { chapters.push(new Chapters('http://thefreeonlinenovel.com'+chapterData[i].querySelector('a').href,moduleID)); } console.log(chapters, type, status, genres, desc, image, title); output = new Output(moduleID,image,linkData,title,desc,genres,type,status,chapters); infoObject = new InfoObject('','get',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(infoObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;

chapters.javaScript:
function Header(key, value) { this.key = key; this.value = value; } function ExtraInfo(value) { this.value = value; } function Output(link, moduleID, headers) { this.link = link; this.moduleID = moduleID; this.headers = headers; } function ChaptersObject(request, method, headers, extraInfo, loadJavascript, javaScript, output) { this.request = request; this.method = method; this.headers = headers; this.extraInfo = extraInfo; this.loadJavascript = loadJavascript; this.javaScript = javaScript; this.output = output; } var savedData = document.querySelector('#katsu-final-data'); var parsedJson = JSON.parse(savedData.innerHTML); var moduleID = '113022'; var headers = [new Header('', '')]; var extraInfo = [new ExtraInfo('')]; var chaptersObject; var output = []; var finalText = ''; var data = document.querySelector('td').querySelectorAll('p'); for (let x = 0; x < data.length; x++) { var text = data[x].innerText; finalText = finalText + '

' + text; } output.push(new Output(finalText, moduleID, headers)); chaptersObject = new ChaptersObject('', '', headers, extraInfo, '', '', output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(chaptersObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson; chaptersObject = new ChaptersObject('','',headers,extraInfo,'','',output); var finalJson = JSON.stringify(chaptersObject); savedData.innerHTML = finalJson;
